DOC.brief_summary: The study objective evaluate effect sildenafil citrate hardness erection male erectile dysfunction , base subject response question 5 Event Log ( hardness erection ) measure end double blind treatment ( week 6 ) .
DOC.criteria: Male subject age 1855 Documented clinical diagnosis erectile dysfunction confirm IIEFEF Domain score less equal 25 . ( If subject score great 25 IIEFEF Domain , screen procedure terminate . ) Subjects treat 6 dos sildenafil citrate phosphodiesterase type 5 ( PDE5 ) inhibitor vardenafil tadalafil erectile dysfunction [ Note : subject take PDE5 inhibitor within 4 week prior date screening ]
